chinese: [C, U] the act of admitting one’s crimes, faults, etc. 承认；坦白
examples: e.g. I have a [[confession]] to make — I scraped (擦坏) your car when I was parking mine.

chinese: use all or most of your time, effort, etc. in order to do sth. or help sb. 致力；献身；倾注
examples: e.g. After graduating from law school, he [[devoted]] his energies to writing film scripts.

chinese: showing great fondness or loyalty; caring a great deal 忠实的；热爱···的
examples: e.g. There is absolutely no doubt that this woman was a totally [[devoted]] and caring mother.

chinese: impossible to satisfy 无法满足的
examples: e.g. The public has an [[insatiable]] appetite for stories about famous people.

chinese: [C] a very strong desire for sth. 渴望；热望
examples: e.g. Surprisingly, his headache and fatigue subsided (减轻) and his [[craving]] for alcohol disappeared.

chinese: coming from, found in, or typical of the tropics 来自热带的；产于热带的；热带的
examples: e.g. Under normal conditions, the ocean currents of the [[tropical]] Pacific travel from east to west.

chinese: difficult in an interesting or enjoyable way 富有挑战性的
examples: e.g. Mike found a [[challenging]] job as a computer programmer.

chinese: [U] 微积分
gradually become familiar with a new situation （使）适应；（使）习惯
examples: e.g. I felt I had [[adjusted]] to the idea of being a mother very well.

chinese: 1) (BrE hall of residence, infml.) （大学里的）学生宿舍楼
2) (esp. BrE, infml.) 大寝室；宿舍
[C] (pl. zucchini or zucchinis) (BrE courgette) （绿皮）密生西葫芦
[C, U] 黄瓜
1) the power or opportunity to use sb. / sth. 处置权
examples: e.g. During their visit, I left my car at their [[disposal]].；e.g. We should not give up this option for the [[disposal]] of nuclear waste.

chinese: 2) the act or means of getting rid of sth. 清理；处理
examples: e.g. During their visit, I left my car at their [[disposal]].；e.g. We should not give up this option for the [[disposal]] of nuclear waste.

chinese: 1) examine or consider with attention and in detail 仔细研究；仔细考虑
examples: e.g. Officials of the union are [[perusing]] the deal.；e.g. She found the information while she was [[perusing]] a copy of Life magazine.

chinese: 2) (fml.) read sth, esp. in a careful way 读；（尤指）细读，精读
examples: e.g. Officials of the union are [[perusing]] the deal.；e.g. She found the information while she was [[perusing]] a copy of Life magazine.

chinese: 1) in a worried or unhappy way 担忧地；不快地
examples: e.g. "We have to get those windows open," I announced [[grimly]] to my husband.；e.g. "Now, I can wait for you," he said [[grimly]], "but hurry up."

chinese: 2) seriously 严肃地
examples: e.g. "We have to get those windows open," I announced [[grimly]] to my husband.；e.g. "Now, I can wait for you," he said [[grimly]], "but hurry up."

chinese: (fruit or vegetables) dry and not tasting good （水果或蔬菜）干巴难吃的
examples: e.g. The apples we bought yesterday are kind of [[mealy]].

chinese: of a light shade of red 浅粉红色的
examples: e.g. Her nostrils (鼻孔) were [[pinkish]], as though she had a cold.

chinese: [C, U] 卷心莴苣
(also ~ up) put paper or cloth over sth. to cover it （用纸或布）包，裹（某物）
examples: e.g. He [[wrapped]] a bandage around my injured wrist.

chinese: [C] the piece of paper or plastic that covers sth. when it is sold （商品的）包装纸（塑料）
examples: e.g. The kids were asked to put the sweet [[wrappers]] into the rubbish bin.

chinese: [C, U] the skin of some fruit and vegetables, esp. the thick skin of fruit such as oranges, which you do not eat （水果和蔬菜的）外皮（尤指橙子等不能食用的厚皮）
examples: e.g. Usually, we speak of orange [[peel]] and apple [[peel]], but of tomato skin.；e.g. She sat down in the kitchen and began to [[peel]] potatoes.

chinese: remove the skin from fruit or vegetables 剥去（削去）（水果或蔬菜）的皮
examples: e.g. Usually, we speak of orange [[peel]] and apple [[peel]], but of tomato skin.；e.g. She sat down in the kitchen and began to [[peel]] potatoes.

chinese: 1) not having a lot of experience of life 不谙世故的；天真的
examples: e.g. I cannot believe you have such [[unworldly]] views on things as a grown man.；e.g. The singer seems somewhat [[unworldly]] because he hates commercial advertising and social activities.

chinese: 2) not interested in money or possessions 对钱财不感兴趣；脱俗的
examples: e.g. I cannot believe you have such [[unworldly]] views on things as a grown man.；e.g. The singer seems somewhat [[unworldly]] because he hates commercial advertising and social activities.

chinese: having or showing good education, manners, and an interest in art, music, literature, etc. 有文化的；有教养的；有修养的
examples: e.g. The people who will be on the committee are moral, [[cultured]], and competent.

chinese: [U, sing.] (BrE also realisation) the process of becoming aware of sth. 认识；意识；领悟
examples: e.g. There is now a growing [[realization]] that things cannot go on like this for much longer.

chinese: 1) (take sb. / sth. for granted) be so used to sb. / sth. that you do not recognize their true value any more and do not show that you are grateful （因习以为常）视···为理所当然（而对其不重视）
examples: e.g. I came into adult life clueless about a lot of things that most people take for [[granted]].；e.g. In response to the lawyer's appeals, the Home Secretary [[granted]] a free pardon (赦免).

chinese: 2) (fml.) give sb. sth. or allow them to have sth. that they have asked for 给予；准予
examples: e.g. I came into adult life clueless about a lot of things that most people take for [[granted]].；e.g. In response to the lawyer's appeals, the Home Secretary [[granted]] a free pardon (赦免).

chinese: 1) [C] the reason why you want to do sth. 动机；原因
examples: e.g. What was your [[motivation]] for becoming a doctor?；e.g. Jack is an intelligent pupil, but he lacks [[motivation]].

chinese: 2) [U] eagerness and willingness to do sth. without needing to be told or forced to do it 动力；积极性
examples: e.g. What was your [[motivation]] for becoming a doctor?；e.g. Jack is an intelligent pupil, but he lacks [[motivation]].

chinese: [C] sth. that needs attention, consideration, service, etc. before others 优先处理的事；当务之急
examples: e.g. After several burglaries (入室盗窃) in the area, security is now a high [[priority]].

chinese: of the color of gold 金色的
examples: e.g. He was so attracted by the girl with [[golden]] hair that he did not hear anything his father said.

chinese: [C, U] 蛋黄
[sing.] the sound of sth. being crushed or like sth. being crushed or broken 嘎吱的响声
examples: e.g. I heard a loud [[crunch]] as the truck ran into the wall.

chinese: relating to farming or gardening methods of growing food without using artificial chemicals, or produced or grown by these methods 不使用化肥的；有机的；绿色的
examples: e.g. Now [[organic]] farming is expanding everywhere in China.

chinese: relating to a type of farming which allows animals such as chickens and pigs to move around and eat naturally, rather than being kept in a restricted space 放养的；散养的
examples: e.g. She says that [[free-range]] chickens taste much better than factory-farmed ones.

chinese: (fml.) take part in an activity or event 参加；参与
examples: e.g. China will actively [[participate]] in global affairs and play a constructive role in maintaining world peace.

chinese: [C, usu. pl.] 耳塞（小型耳机）
become or make sth. become liquid as a result of heating （使）熔化，融化
examples: e.g. The snow had [[melted]], but the lake was still frozen solid.

chinese: [U] (fml.) food which keeps people or animals strong and healthy 营养；食物
examples: e.g. Throughout human history we have depended on nature for [[sustenance]], well-being, and development.

chinese: very great 巨大的；重大的
examples: e.g. The mother's behavior has a [[profound]] impact on the developing child.

chinese: having a great influence or effect 影响深远的
examples: e.g. The report outlines the most [[far-reaching]] changes in housing policy for 30 years.

chinese: grave problems, situations, or worries are very great or bad 严重的；重大的；严峻的
examples: e.g. The situation poses a [[grave]] threat to world peace.；e.g. She tore the rose apart and scattered the petals (花瓣) over the [[grave]].

chinese: [C] a place in the ground where a dead body is buried 墓穴；坟墓
examples: e.g. The situation poses a [[grave]] threat to world peace.；e.g. She tore the rose apart and scattered the petals (花瓣) over the [[grave]].

chinese: [C, U] a statement about what you think is going to happen, or the act of making this statement 预言；预测
examples: e.g. He was unwilling to make a [[prediction]] about which books would sell well in the coming year.

chinese: pass or assist sb. in passing (a difficult, testing experience, or period) 熬过或助人熬过（困境）
examples: e.g. I don't know how we're going to [[get through]] the winter.

chinese: laugh, or cause others to laugh, rather unkindly at 嘲笑；取笑
examples: e.g. People [[make fun of]] her because she wears such a strange hat.

chinese: able to be used freely by sb. 供某人支配
examples: e.g. We will use all the means at our disposal to solve this problem.

chinese: recognize sb. / sth. in a group of people or things 分辨出；辨认出
examples: e.g. Steven describes himself as "a regular guy — you couldn't [[pick out]] me out of a crowd."

chinese: not tell anyone about sth. 把···秘而不宣；不将···说出去
examples: e.g. I have to tell someone. I can't [[keep it to myself]].

chinese: be very different from sth; not be connected with sth. 与···大相径庭；与···不相干
examples: e.g. Many of these books are far removed from the reality of children's lives.

chinese: be dependent on 依靠
examples: e.g. They have to [[rely on]] the river for their water.

chinese: (of fruit or vegetables) easily available and ready to eat because it is the right time of year for them （水果或蔬菜）当令的
examples: e.g. These are the dog days (伏天); watermelons are just in season.

chinese: following in order or importance after sb. / sth. 仅次于；紧接
examples: e.g. [[Next to]] biology, I like physics best.

chinese: mostly; usually 通常；多半
examples: e.g. These small pieces of land were purchased [[for the most part]] by local people.

chinese: in the future 在将来；今后
examples: e.g. She might be able to help you pursue a promotion [[down the road]].

chinese: 阿巴拉契亚（美国东部地区）
